availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jeremiah Wellman (Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky, merchant. Virginia native. Married to Zerilda Wellman. Father of Elizabeth Wellman, John Wellman, Isabella Wellman, and Ceres Wellman. Merchant in Wayne County, Virginia in 1850. Merchant in Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Virginia, Wayne County, District 66, p. 228A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 795.
